General.Name: SOHO China Limited
General.Description: SOHO China Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the real estate development, and property leasing and management activities in the People's Republic of China. The company also operates serviced hotels. SOHO China Limited was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.
General.Address: Chaowai SOHO, Tower A, Beijing, China, 100020
